hero.label: AI-first technology company
hero.headline: Build intelligent digital platforms that scale with your business.
hero.descriptionOne: Carriastic delivers scalable, business-ready software products and customized platforms for organizations operating in a rapidly evolving AI landscape.
hero.descriptionTwo: We embed AI across the entire delivery lifecycle to move faster, improve accuracy, and maintain enterprise-grade quality.

highlights.title: AI-first delivery
highlights.description: AI is integrated across design, engineering, and QA.

highlights.title: Enterprise quality
highlights.description: Reliable platforms built for governance and scale.

highlights.title: Lifecycle ownership
highlights.description: From strategy to optimization, we stay accountable.

offerings.label: What we deliver
offerings.headline: Services we offer
offerings.description: Strategy-first services delivered through long-term partnership, AI-driven solutions, and scalable platform execution.

services.title: Long-Term Technology Partnership
services.description: Continuous evolution, AI scaling, and leadership across performance, security, and reliability.

services.title: AI-Powered Business Solutions
services.description: Generative AI, RAG with enterprise data, agentic workflows, and AI copilots.

services.title: Custom Software & Platform Development
services.description: Internal systems, enterprise platforms, customer apps, and API-driven architectures.

services.title: AI Enablement & System Integration
services.description: AI strategy, integration into existing systems, data pipelines, and compliance.

services.title: Business Process Automation & Optimization
services.description: Workflow analysis, intelligent automation, AI routing, and monitoring systems.

services.title: Internal AI Adoption & AI-First Transformation
services.description: Internal AI tools, AI-assisted development, QA workflows, and enablement.

services.title: Ready-to-Deploy Products
services.description: Pre-built AI tools, configurable platforms, and industry-specific solutions.

services.title: Product Design, Quality & Growth Services
services.description: UI/UX design, QA & testing, plus Digital Growth & Product Marketing.

capabilities.label: AI products
capabilities.headline: Advanced AI systems designed for impact
capabilities.description: We build three core AI products that combine automation, contextual knowledge, and governance to support critical decisions.

products.title: Generative AI applications
products.description: A productized suite of assistants for content creation, automation, and experience design.

products.title: RAG and knowledge systems
products.description: A secure knowledge product that grounds models in your enterprise data.

products.title: Agentic AI workflows
products.description: An orchestration product for autonomous tasks with human-in-the-loop control.

capabilities.highlightDescription: Intelligence embedded across product, engineering, and operations.

cards.title: UX Driven Engineering
cards.description: Design leads delivery, ensuring UX research and UI systems translate directly into build decisions.

cards.title: Developing Shared Understanding
cards.description: We align stakeholders early with clear scope, workflows, and success metrics for confident execution.

cards.title: Proven Experience and Expertise
cards.description: Seasoned product, design, and engineering leaders guide each phase with predictable quality.

cards.title: Security & Intellectual Property (IP)
cards.description: Secure-by-default architecture, NDA/IP protection, and compliance practices are embedded from day one.

cards.title: Code Reviews
cards.description: Peer reviews, standards, and automated checks keep code consistent, safe, and maintainable.

cards.title: Quality Assurance & Testing
cards.description: Manual and automated testing cover regression, performance, and launch readiness.

leadership.label: Leadership voices
leadership.headline: Quotes from our leadership
leadership.description: Our leadership team stays close to delivery, ensuring every client engagement remains focused on measurable business outcomes.

quotes.name: Md. Rafidul Islam
quotes.title: Chief Executive Officer
quotes.quote: We are engineering the next operating layer for enterprises: AI-native platforms that sense, learn, and optimize in real time, so every decision is faster, smarter, and measurable.

quotes.name: Syed Hasan Ahmed Anik
quotes.title: Chief Operating Officer
quotes.quote: Our delivery model treats AI as infrastructure, not a feature - we orchestrate data, workflows, and agents into a resilient pipeline that scales from pilot to enterprise-grade automation.

quotes.name: Ahsan Habib Ethic
quotes.title: Chief Marketing Officer
quotes.quote: We help brands move from digital presence to digital intelligence, where customer interactions are predictive, personalized, and continuously evolving through generative and agentic systems.

cta.label: Ready to build
cta.headline: Partner with Carriastic for AI-powered growth
cta.description: We design intelligent platforms that evolve with your business and deliver measurable value over the long term.

developmentProcess.label: Our Development Approach
developmentProcess.headline: How development through Carriastic works
developmentProcess.description: A structured, AI-ready delivery flow that keeps teams aligned and ships in predictable iterations.

steps.title: Discovery & outcome alignment
steps.description: We define the business goals, user journeys, and success metrics that guide every decision.

steps.title: AI-first team setup
steps.description: A cross-functional squad is assembled with product, design, and AI engineering leads.

steps.title: Architecture & data readiness
steps.description: We design secure, scalable systems and prepare the data foundation for AI workflows.

steps.title: Sprint planning & demos
steps.description: Weekly planning and demos keep priorities clear, feedback tight, and delivery predictable.

steps.title: Code review & QA gates
steps.description: Peer reviews, automated checks, and QA gates keep quality high before release.

steps.title: Iterative delivery & optimization
steps.description: We ship in milestones, monitor results, and continuously improve performance and UX.
